name: Topics in Political Philosophy
description: This course will examine some contemporary debates in recent political philosophy. Topics discussed may include the nature of justice, liberty and the criteria of good government, and problems of social coordination.
prerequisites: 5.0 full credits, including one of [PHLB02H3, PHLB05H3, PHLB06H3, PHLB07H3, (PHLB08H3), PHLB09H3, PHLB17H3, (PHLB36H3)] and 1.0 additional credit in Philosophy
